abilities.desc: After you deal damage with an Action or Ability, you heal 1. This Ability cannot heal you more than the Bleed Value in a single turn.
abilities.trigger: after you deal damage with an action or ability

abilities.desc: After you give Weakness tokens to an enemy, you gain 1 Power token, to a maximum of 4 Power tokens per turn.
abilities.trigger: after you give weakness tokens to an enemy

actions.name: Life Steal
actions.desc: Deal 2 damage and give 1 Weakness token to an enemy within range.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.desc: Target an enemy you can see. Pull them up to 4, then if they are now within your range, give them 2 Weakness tokens.
